Package ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict

Class AbstractWordList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict.AbstractWordList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WordList
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BucketList, TernaryTreeList
    public abstract class AbstractWordList
extends Object
implements WordList
    An abstract base class that provides default implementations for several methods.

      • findWordsWithinEditDistance

        public abstract Set<String> findWordsWithinEditDistance​(String word,
                                                        int d)
        Returns a set of the words within edit distance d of word. A Hamming distance of d means that up to d letters in a matching word can be different, inserted, or deleted in word.
        Parameters:
        word - the target word
        d - the acceptable edit distance
        Returns:
        words in the list within edit distance d of pattern

      • getFrequencyRank

        public int getFrequencyRank​(String word)
        Description copied from interface: WordList
        Returns the frequency rank of word if this list has frequency data and the word is contained in the list.Otherwise returns -1. The frequency rank is a number between WordList.RANK_MINIMUM and WordList.RANK_MAXIMUM inclusive that indicates how commonly a word is used in typical text, with 0 being the most frequent.
        Specified by:
        getFrequencyRank in interface WordList
        Parameters:
        word - the word to look up a rank for
        Returns:
        the frequency rank of the word or -1

      • hasFrequencyRanks

        public boolean hasFrequencyRanks()
        Description copied from interface: WordList
        Returns true if this list contains the data needed to provide frequency rank information. Even if a particular list type supports frequency ranks, a particular instance may not have this data available.
        Specified by:
        hasFrequencyRanks in interface WordList
        Returns:
        true if frequency rank data is available for this word list

      • getSuggestions

        public Suggestion[] getSuggestions​(WordPolicy policy,
                                   String badWord,
                                   int d,
                                   int limit)
        Description copied from interface: WordList
        Returns suggested replacements for a misspelled word, sorted by increasing order of relevance.
        Specified by:
        getSuggestions in interface WordList
        Parameters:
        policy - a policy used to improve the quality of the results (may be null)
        badWord - the word to find replacements for
        d - the maximum edit distance to search, or -1 to use the default value
        limit - the maximum number of suggestions to return; no limit if < 1
        Returns:
        at most limit suggestions, sorted from most to least likely

      • readImpl

        protected abstract void readImpl​(InputStream in)
                          throws IOException
        Reads the list from a stream.

        This is called by the default implementations of the public read methods to perform the actual read operations. Subclasses need only implement this method to provide reading capabilities.

        Parameters:
        in - the stream to read the list from
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • write

        public void write​(File f,
                  int optLevel)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: WordList
        Writes the list to a file. The format of the list depends on the specific list implementation.
        Specified by:
        write in interface WordList
        Parameters:
        f - the file to write to
        optLevel - an optimization hint between 0 and 9 that suggests how hard the writer should try to reduce the file size
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the list

      • write

        public void write​(OutputStream out,
                  int optLevel)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: WordList
        Writes the list to an output stream without closing the stream. The format of the list depends on the specific list implementation. The optLevel parameter controls the time/space tradeoff between write time and file size. The value must be between 0 (no optimization) and 9 (smallest file size) inclusive. (Depending on the implementation, this parameter may or may not have an effect. See the documentation for the specific class.)
        Specified by:
        write in interface WordList
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to write to
        optLevel - an optimization hint between 0 and 9 that suggests how hard the writer should try to reduce the file size
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the list

      • writeImpl

        protected abstract void writeImpl​(OutputStream out,
                                  int optLevel)
                           throws IOException
        Writes the list to a file.

        This is called by the default implementations of the public write methods to perform the actual write operations. Subclasses need only implement this method to provide writing capabilities.

        Parameters:
        out - the stream to write the list to
        optLevel - the optimization level, where relevant, from 0 to 9
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
